meaningMnemonic: <radical>Tsunami</radical>s hit these lands <radical>again</radical> and again, molding it into some kind of <radical>bow</radical> shape. Or in other words, creating a <kanji>gulf</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: How many <kanji>gulf</kanji>s will this create? Just <reading>one</reading> (<ja>わん</ja>).
